General.Name: Poujoulat S.A.
General.Description: Poujoulat SA manufactures and sells metal chimneys and stacks for individual homes, collective housing, and new built and renovation industry in France and internationally. It offers chimney and flues, which include connecting flue pipes, single wall and flexible liners, twin wall insulated chimney systems, balanced flue systems, draught improvement systems, chimney accessories, filtration appliances, and warm air distribution systems; pre-fabricated chimney stacks for residential housing; and chimney and exhausts for commercial and industrial applications. The company exports its products to various countries. Poujoulat SA was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Saint-Symphorien, France.
